attributes.action: allow easier access to birth marrige and death certificates for family history researchers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make things easier and cheaper for family history researchers by allowing access on the internet to birth marrige and death certificates say pre 1907 for say 50 pence per view, the cost to see a certificate a the moment if you are doing family history is far to high £7 a go, for instance if a person had 5 possibles for a ancestors birth £35 is quite a lot to lay out,  if this idea was allowed not only would it be of enormous help to researchers worldwide but would also create a good deal of income for the treasury

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
